FuncDef: This command displays the list of provider tunnels existing in the router for all services. The output can be filtered based on the provider tunnel owner.

ParaDef.Info: Displays the leaf-only provider tunnels for all services.
Displays the root and leaf provider tunnels for all services.
Filters the provider tunnels owned by BGP AD services.
Filters the provider tunnels owned by BGP VPLS services.
Filters the provider tunnels owned by BGP EVPN-MPLS services.
